## SetPublicPathPlugin class

This simple plugin sets the \_\_webpack\_public\_path\_\_ variable to a value specified in the arguments.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SetPublicPathPlugin extends SetPublicPathPluginBase 
```
**Extends:** [SetPublicPathPluginBase](./set-webpack-public-path-plugin.setpublicpathpluginbase.md)
